thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 20 of 3553
thread.title: Steph

author: Steph
title: Steph
text: I have purchased from Thrift Books three times now and have been very happy with them. Shipping is sometimes slow but the quality of the books has never disappointed me--just be sure to read the description supplied. (When one of my orders arrived damaged (it was listed as very good but was missing a few pages in the heart of the book--otherwise it looked great) I contacted customer service and they issued me a refund. No questions asked. I am very pleased with Thrift Books and would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone!
